resources.string:
• New Statistics section in your profile
Now you can see the progress you've made and a lot of joyful information!

 • Bulgarian and Ukrainian languages are added
Welcome to the club, buddy!

 • Major UI improvements
Animations, better design, fonts, fixed visual bugs. All included!

• Less ads
Ads appear less in short tests (15 secs, 30 secs).

 • More statistics
Statistics became more informative.

 • Other improvements
Now it's shown in a typed word list if an inputted word is shorter than the original.

 • Bug fixes
Fixed app crash on Android 12 and higher.
Fixed a bug that caused text suggestions not to work.
Fixed a bug when statistics displayed the wrong time a user has spent on tests.

• Less ads 
Ads appear less in 1-minute tests.

 • Other improvements
Some "under the hood" changes to improve app stability.

This is more of an "under the hood" update. It will make future updates much easier.
 • Less ads
Ads appear less in most games.

 • Bug fixes
Fixed a bug when the last completed achievement in statistics could be displayed in wrong language.

 • Other improvements
Languages are now sorted in alphabetical order.

 • What to expect next?
More achievements, new game mode and some other features. Stay tuned!

The main page has been redesigned!
 • Bug fixes
Fixed a major bug that, while playing, could cause the app to crash unexpectedly.
Fixed a bug when some statistics cards could be invisible.

 • Other improvements
Added the "Replay" button on the main page.
The results page now shows the difference between the current and the previous result.

This update aims at the app’s optimization, bug fixes and some adjustments

 • 10-minute test! Now there is no reason to rush
 • All transitions between screens have been changed, they have become quicker and more responsive
 • The result screen loads much faster and the typed words list is moved to another window
 • The profile tab is slightly redesigned
 • The favorite Time mode statistics are back!
 • Fixed a bug when if a user had 0% progression, then the respective statistics card was locked
 • Fixed Ukrainian words with wrong characters
 • Now the game doesn't crash if a user reaches the end of a text

• Now you can see both WPM (Words Per Minute) and CPM (Characters Per Minute) in the results!
 • Added Czech language
 • The English dictionary has become more universal. Words like color/colour, defense/defence are removed
 • Fixed the 0 WPM bug, when the WPM could only be calculated in a 60-second game
 • When a user is being switched to the result screen, the bottom buttons are blocked for a short period of time to prevent accidental clicks
 • Now it's less likely to crash when resuming the app after a while.
